<P class="p1471 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">Since then, the OECD has developed an international legal framework, the Multilateral Competent Authority Agreement on Automatic Exchange of Information on Income Derived through Digital Platforms (the “DPI MCAA”, contained in Part I of this note), to support the annual automatic exchange of information by the residence jurisdiction of the platform operator with the jurisdictions of residence of the sellers (and, with respect to transactions involving the rental of immovable property, the jurisdictions in which such immovable property is located), as determined on the basis of the due diligence procedures .</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1472 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">Reflecting recent developments and the interest of a number of jurisdictions to permit the extension of the scope of the Model Rules to additionally cover the sale of goods and the rental of means of transportation, the OECD has also developed an optional module, contained in Part II of this note) that would allow such jurisdictions to implement the Model Rules with an extended scope. In this light, the DPI MCAA foresees the possibility to either send information on the basis of the scope of the Model Rules or to cover both the scope of the Model Rules and the extended scope.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1471 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">Further, the DPI MCAA enables sending jurisdictions to provide the information to an interested receiving jurisdiction, even if the receiving jurisdiction did not itself implement the Model Rules. This is to facilitate situations where a jurisdiction has incentives to exchange such information on a </SPAN><NOBR>non-reciprocal</NOBR> basis. In order to enable such exchanges, the DPI MCAA therefore foresees the possibility to activate the DPI MCAA for receiving information, even in absence of domestic legislation in the receiving jurisdiction, either for the scope of the Model Rules or both the Model Rules and the optional module.</P>
<P class="p1473 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">372</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_373">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1248 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1249 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1458 ft54"><SPAN class="ft152">6</SPAN><SPAN class="ft153">|</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1474 ft249">Part I - Multilateral Competent Authority Agreement on automatic exchange of information on income derived through digital platforms</P>
<P class="p1475 ft161">Whereas, the jurisdictions of the signatories to the Multilateral Competent Authority Agreement on Automatic Exchange of Information on Income Derived through Digital Platforms (the “Agreement”) are Parties of, or territories covered by, the Convention on Mutual Administrative Assistance in Tax Matters or the Convention on Mutual Administrative Assistance in Tax Matters as amended by the Protocol amending the Convention on Mutual Administrative Assistance in Tax Matters (the “Convention”);</P>
<P class="p1268 ft162">Whereas, the jurisdictions intend to improve international tax compliance by further building on their relationship with respect to mutual assistance in tax matters;</P>
<P class="p1320 ft162">Whereas, the Model Rules for Reporting by Platform Operators with respect to Sellers in the Sharing and Gig Economy were developed by the OECD/G20 BEPS Inclusive Framework to improve tax compliance;</P>
<P class="p1290 ft161">Whereas, the jurisdictions interested in sending information consistent with the scope of exchange contemplated by Section 2 of this Agreement are required to have the necessary laws in place to implement the Model Rules, while jurisdictions may express an interest in receiving such information without implementing the Model Rules;</P>
<P class="p1266 ft162">Whereas the Model Rules cover income derived from the provision of accommodation, transportation and other personal services, some jurisdictions may be interested to also exchange information in respect of the sale of goods and the rental of means of transportation facilitated by digital platforms;</P>
<P class="p1362 ft162">Whereas, this Agreement is concluded to enable the automatic exchange of information collected pursuant to the Model Rules it can also be relied upon to permit exchanges of information on income from the sale of goods and the rental of means of transportation facilitated by digital platforms;</P>
<P class="p1320 ft161">Whereas, some jurisdictions intend to rely on the information exchanged to promote upfront compliance and, where appropriate, the prefilling of tax returns;</P>
<P class="p1268 ft162">Whereas, Chapter III of the Convention authorises the exchange of information for tax purposes, including the exchange of information on an automatic basis, and allows the Competent Authorities of the Jurisdictions to agree on the scope and modalities of such automatic exchanges;</P>
<P class="p1362 ft161">Whereas, Article 6 of the Convention provides that two or more Parties can mutually agree to exchange information automatically, the exchange of the information will be on a bilateral basis between the Competent Authorities;</P>
<P class="p1265 ft161">Whereas, the Jurisdictions have, or are expected to have, in place by the time the first exchange takes place (i) appropriate safeguards to ensure that the information received pursuant to this Agreement</P>
<P class="p1476 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">373</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_374">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1252 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1253 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1466 ft54">| <SPAN class="ft152">7</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1477 ft161">remains confidential and is used solely for the purposes set out in the Convention, and (ii) the infrastructure for an effective exchange relationship (including established processes for ensuring timely, accurate, and confidential information exchanges, effective and reliable communications, and capabilities to promptly resolve questions and concerns about exchanges or requests for exchanges and to administer the provisions of Section 4 of this Agreement);</P>
<P class="p1478 ft161">Whereas, the Competent Authorities of the Jurisdictions intend to conclude an agreement to improve international tax compliance based on automatic exchange pursuant to the Convention, without prejudice to national legislative procedures (if any), and subject to the confidentiality and other protections provided for in the Convention, including the provisions limiting the use of the information exchanged thereunder;</P>
<P class="p1479 ft144">Now, therefore, the Competent Authorities have agreed as follows:</P>
<P class="p1480 ft250">SECTION 1</P>
<P class="p1481 ft181">Definitions</P>
<P class="p1482 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft168">For the purposes of this Agreement, the following terms have the following meanings:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1472 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">the term </SPAN><SPAN class="ft185">“Jurisdiction” </SPAN>means a country or a territory in respect of which the Convention is in force and is in effect, either through signature and ratification in accordance with Article 28, or through territorial extension in accordance with Article 29, and which is a signatory to this Agreement;</P>
<P class="p1483 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">the term </SPAN><SPAN class="ft185">“Competent Authority” </SPAN>means, for each respective Jurisdiction, the persons and authorities listed in Annex B of the Convention;</P>
<P class="p1484 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">the term </SPAN><SPAN class="ft180">“Reporting Platform Operator” </SPAN>means, for each respective Jurisdiction that has implemented the Model Rules, any Platform Operator, other than an Excluded Platform Operator, that is resident for tax purposes in the Jurisdiction or, where a Platform Operator does not have a residence for tax purposes, either:</P>
<P class="p1436 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">i.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft206">is incorporated under the laws of the Jurisdiction; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1485 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">ii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft251">has its place of management (including effective management) in the Jurisdiction.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1472 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">the term </SPAN><SPAN class="ft180">“Government Verification Service” </SPAN>means, for each respective Jurisdiction, an electronic process made available by a Jurisdiction to a Platform Operator for the purposes of ascertaining the identity and tax residence of a Seller, as specified in the notification pursuant to subparagraph 1(f) of Section 7;</P>
<P class="p1478 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">the term </SPAN><SPAN class="ft180">“Model Rules” </SPAN>means Model Rules for Reporting by Platform Operators with respect to Sellers in the Sharing and Gig Economy (which includes the Commentaries), developed by the OECD/G20 BEPS Inclusive Framework;</P>
<P class="p1486 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft252">the term “</SPAN><SPAN class="ft185">Additional Activity” </SPAN>means a) the sale of Goods; or b) the rental of a means of transportation for Consideration;</P>
<P class="p1487 ft162"><SPAN class="ft246">g)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">the term </SPAN><SPAN class="ft185">“Relevant Service” </SPAN>means a) the rental of immovable property; or b) a Personal Service for Consideration;</P>
<P class="p1487 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">h)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">the term </SPAN><SPAN class="ft185">“Extended Scope” </SPAN>means the extension to the scope of the Model Rules to also cover the Additional Activities;</P>
<P class="p1488 ft162"><SPAN class="ft246">i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft253">the term </SPAN><NOBR><SPAN class="ft185">“Co-ordinating</SPAN></NOBR><SPAN class="ft185"> Body Secretariat” </SPAN>means the OECD Secretariat that, pursuant to paragraph 3 of Article 24 of the Convention, provides support to the <NOBR>co-ordinating</NOBR> body that is composed of representatives of the competent authorities of the Parties to the Convention; and</P>
<P class="p1489 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">374</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_375">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1248 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1249 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1458 ft54"><SPAN class="ft152">8</SPAN><SPAN class="ft153">|</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1343 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">j)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft252">the term </SPAN><SPAN class="ft185">“Agreement in effect” </SPAN>means, in respect of any two Competent Authorities, that both Competent Authorities have indicated their intention to automatically exchange information with each other and have satisfied the other conditions set out in paragraph 2 of Section 7.</P>
<P class="p1320 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">Any capitalised term not otherwise defined in this Agreement will have the meaning that it has at that time under the law of the Jurisdiction applying the Agreement, such meaning being consistent with the meaning set forth in the Model Rules and the Extended Scope. Any term not otherwise defined in this Agreement or in the Model Rules or the Extended Scope will, unless the context otherwise requires or the Competent Authorities agree to a common meaning (as permitted by domestic law), have the meaning that it has at that time under the law of the Jurisdiction applying this Agreement, any meaning under the applicable tax laws of that Jurisdiction prevailing over a meaning given to the term under other laws of that Jurisdiction.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1490 ft250">SECTION 2</P>
<P class="p1491 ft181">Exchange of Information with Respect to Reportable Sellers</P>
<P class="p1492 ft186">General Exchange Requirements</P>
<P class="p1268 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">Pursuant to the provisions of Articles 6 and 22 of the Convention and subject to the applicable reporting and due diligence rules consistent with the Model Rules, each Competent Authority will annually exchange with the other Competent Authorities on an automatic basis:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1493 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the information obtained pursuant to such rules and specified in paragraphs 3 and 4 of Section 2 provided it and the other Competent Authority have both lodged a notification pursuant to subparagraph 1(a)(i) of Section 7;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1494 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the information obtained pursuant to such rules and specified in paragraph 5 of Section 2, provided it and the other Competent Authority have both lodged a notification pursuant to subparagraph 1(b)(i) of Section 7;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1495 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the information obtained pursuant to such rules and specified in paragraphs 3 and 4 of Section 2 and, provided it has lodged notifications pursuant to subparagraphs 1(a)(i) and 1(c)(ii) of Section 7 and the other Competent Authority has lodged a notification pursuant to subparagraph 1(a)(ii) of Section 7;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1495 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the information obtained pursuant to such rules and specified in paragraph 5 of Section 2, provided it has lodged notifications pursuant to subparagraphs 1(b)(i) and 1(d)(iii) of Section 7 and the other Competent Authority has lodged a notification pursuant to subparagraph 1(b)(ii) of Section 7; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1496 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the information obtained pursuant to such rules and specified in paragraph 5 of Section 2, provided it has lodged notifications pursuant to subparagraphs 1(b)(i) and 1(d)(ii) of Section 7 and the other Competent Authority has lodged notifications pursuant to subparagraph 1(a)(i) and 1(b)(ii) of Section 7.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1497 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">Notwithstanding paragraph 1, no information is to be sent pursuant to this Section to a Competent Authority that has lodged a notification pursuant to subparagraph 1(e) of Section 7.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1498 ft186">Exchange of Information on Relevant Services with Jurisdiction of Residence</P>
<P class="p1268 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">In relation to each Reporting Platform Operator that has identified a Reportable Seller that is resident in another Jurisdiction, the following information is to be exchanged with the Competent Authority of such Jurisdiction:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1496 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the name, registered office address and TIN of the Reporting Platform Operator, as well as the business name(s) of the Platform(s) in respect of which the Reporting Platform Operator is reporting;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1499 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">375</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_376">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p27 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p576 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1500 ft54">| <SPAN class="ft152">9</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1501 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the name, Primary Address, TIN(s), including the Jurisdiction of issuance, and date of birth (in case of an individual) of each Reportable Seller and, in the case of any Reportable Seller that is an Entity, the business registration number, unless the Reporting Platform Operator relied on a Government Verification Service to ascertain the identity and tax residence of a Reportable Seller;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1502 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">in case the Reporting Platform Operator relied on a Government Verification Service to ascertain the identity and tax residence of a Reportable Seller, the name, Government Verification Service identifier, and any other TIN, including the Jurisdiction of issuance;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1503 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the Financial Account Identifier(s), insofar as the Jurisdiction of the Reportable Seller requires such information pursuant to a notification under subparagraph 1(j) of Section 7;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1504 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft254">where different from the name of the Reportable Seller, the name of the holder of the financial account to which the Consideration is paid or credited, as well as any other identifying information reported by the Reporting Platform Operator with respect to that account holder;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1505 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">for Relevant Services other than for the rental of immovable property:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1506 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">i.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft256">the total Consideration paid or credited during each quarter of the Reportable Period and the number of such Relevant Services in respect of which it was paid or credited; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1507 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">ii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft256">any fees, commissions or taxes withheld or charged by the Reporting Platform Operator during each quarter of the Reportable Period.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1508 ft144"><SPAN class="ft246">g)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">for Relevant Services for the rental of immovable property:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1509 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">i.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">the address and land registration number of each Property Listing;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1510 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">ii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft257">the total Consideration paid or credited during each quarter of the Reportable Period and the number of such Relevant Services provided with respect to each Property Listing in respect of which it was paid or credited;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1511 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">iii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft257">any fees, commissions or taxes withheld or charged by the Reporting Platform Operator during each quarter of the Reportable Period; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1512 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">iv.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft258">the number of days each Property Listing was rented during the Reportable Period and the type of each Property Listing.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1513 ft186">Exchange of Information on Relevant Services with Jurisdiction where Immovable Property is Located</P>
<P class="p1315 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">In relation to each Reporting Platform Operator that has identified a Reportable Seller that provided Relevant Services for the rental of immovable property located in another Jurisdiction or that is paid or credited Consideration in connection with Relevant Services for the rental of immovable property located in another Jurisdiction, the following information is to be exchanged with the Competent Authority of such Jurisdiction:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1514 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the information specified in subparagraphs 3(a) and (c) through (e);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1515 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft254">the name, Primary Address and date of birth (in case of an individual) of each Reportable Seller and, in the case of any Reportable Seller that is an Entity, the business registration number;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1253 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">for Relevant Services for the rental of immovable property located in the Jurisdiction:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1509 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">i.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">the address and land registration number of each Property Listing;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1510 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">ii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft257">the total Consideration paid or credited during each quarter of the Reportable Period and the number of such Relevant Services provided with respect to each Property Listing in respect of which it was paid or credited;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1516 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">iii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft258">any fees, commissions or taxes withheld or charged by the Reporting Platform Operator during each quarter of the Reportable Period; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1517 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">376</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_377">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1248 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1249 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1458 ft54"><SPAN class="ft152">10</SPAN><SPAN class="ft153">|</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1518 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">iv.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft259">the number of days each Property Listing was rented during the Reportable Period and the type of each Property Listing.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1519 ft186">Exchange of Information on Additional Activities</P>
<P class="p1268 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">In relation to each Reporting Platform Operator that has identified a Reportable Seller that provided Additional Activities and that is resident in another Jurisdiction, the following information is to be exchanged with the Competent Authority of such Jurisdiction.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1520 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">the information specified in subparagraphs 3(a) through (e);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1521 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">the total Consideration paid or credited during each quarter of the Reportable Period and the number of Additional Activities in respect of which it was paid or credited; and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1521 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">any fees, commissions or taxes withheld or charged by the Reporting Platform Operator during each quarter of the Reportable Period.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1522 ft250">SECTION 3</P>
<P class="p1523 ft181">Time and Manner of Exchange of Information</P>
<P class="p1460 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">For the purposes of the exchange of information in Section 2, the information exchanged will identify the currency in which each relevant amount is denominated.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1320 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">With respect to paragraphs 3, 4 and 5 of Section 2 and paragraph 2 of Section 4, and subject to the notification procedure set out in Section 7, including the dates specified therein, information is to be exchanged commencing from the years specified. Competent Authorities shall use all reasonable efforts to exchange the information within two months after the end of the Reportable Period to which the information relates, and should proceed with exchanges no later than four months after the end of the Reportable Period to which the information relates. Notwithstanding the foregoing, information is only required to be exchanged with respect to a Reportable Period for which both Competent Authorities have this Agreement in effect on the basis of paragraph 2 of Section 7.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1524 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">The Competent Authorities will automatically exchange the information described in Section 2 in the prescribed multilaterally agreed schema in Extensible Markup Language.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1384 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">The Competent Authorities will transmit the information through the OECD Common Transmission System and in compliance with the related encryption and file preparation standards.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1525 ft250">SECTION 4</P>
<P class="p1526 ft181">Collaboration on Compliance and Enforcement</P>
<P class="p1527 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">A Competent Authority will notify the other Competent Authority when the </SPAN><NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> Competent Authority has reason to believe that an error may have led to incorrect or incomplete information reporting or there is <NOBR>non-compliance</NOBR> by a Reporting Platform Operator with the applicable reporting requirements and due diligence procedures consistent with the Model Rules or the Extended Scope. The notified Competent Authority will take all appropriate measures available under its domestic law to address the errors or <NOBR>non-compliance</NOBR> described in the notice.</P>
<P class="p1265 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">To the extent such information is available, a Competent Authority that is notified by a Reporting Platform Operator that a Reporting Platform Operator in another jurisdiction is assuming reporting obligations for the </SPAN><NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> Reporting Platform Operator will exchange the name, registered office address and TIN of each <NOBR>second-mentioned</NOBR> Reporting Platform Operator with the Competent Authority of the Jurisdiction of such Reporting Platform Operator. In addition, to the extent such information is available, a Competent Authority that is notified by a Reporting Platform Operator that it is assuming the reporting</P>
<P class="p1528 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">377</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_378">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p27 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p576 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1529 ft54">| <SPAN class="ft152">11</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1356 ft162">obligations for a Reporting Platform Operator in another jurisdiction will exchange the name, registered office address and TIN of each <NOBR>second-mentioned</NOBR> Reporting Platform Operator with the Competent Authority of the Jurisdiction of such Reporting Platform Operation.</P>
<P class="p1530 ft250">SECTION 5</P>
<P class="p1531 ft181">Confidentiality and Data Safeguards</P>
<P class="p1349 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">All information exchanged is subject to the confidentiality rules and other safeguards provided for in the Convention, including the provisions limiting the use of the information exchanged and, to the extent needed to ensure the necessary level of protection of personal data, in accordance with the safeguards which may be specified by the supplying Competent Authority as required under its domestic law and specified in a notification under subparagraph 1(g) of Section 7.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1353 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">To the extent permitted under applicable law, a Competent Authority will notify the </SPAN><NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat immediately regarding any breach of confidentiality or failure of safeguards and any sanctions and remedial actions consequently imposed. The <NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat will notify all Competent Authorities with respect to which there is an Agreement in effect with the first mentioned Competent Authority.</P>
<P class="p1532 ft250">SECTION 6</P>
<P class="p1533 ft181">Consultations and Amendments</P>
<P class="p1349 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">If any difficulties in the implementation or interpretation of this Agreement arise, a Competent Authority may request consultations with one or more of the Competent Authorities to develop appropriate measures to ensure that this Agreement is fulfilled. The Competent Authority that requested the consultations shall ensure, as appropriate, that the </SPAN><NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat is notified of any measures that were developed and the <NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat will notify all Competent Authorities, even those that did not participate in the consultations, of any measures that were developed.</P>
<P class="p1534 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">This Agreement may be amended by consensus by written agreement of all of the Competent Authorities that have the Agreement in effect. Unless otherwise agreed upon, such an amendment is effective on the first day of the month following the expiration of a period of one month after the date of the last signature of such written agreement.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1532 ft250">SECTION 7</P>
<P class="p1535 ft181">Term of Agreement</P>
<P class="p1536 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">A Competent Authority must provide, at the time of signature of this Agreement or as soon as possible thereafter, notifications to the </SPAN><NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat:</P>
<P class="p1537 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">confirming that its Jurisdiction:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1538 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">i.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft256">has the necessary laws in place to implement the Model Rules and specifying the relevant effective dates with respect to the application or completion of the reporting and due diligence procedures; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1539 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">ii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft257">does not have the necessary laws in place, but is interested in receiving the information specified in paragraphs 3 and 4 of Section 2;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1540 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">to the extent applicable, confirming that its Jurisdiction:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1538 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">i.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft256">has the necessary laws in place to implement the Extended Scope and specifying the relevant effective dates with respect to the application or completion of the reporting and due diligence procedures; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1541 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">378</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_379">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1248 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1249 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1458 ft54"><SPAN class="ft152">12</SPAN><SPAN class="ft153">|</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1542 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">ii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft259">does not have the necessary laws in place, but is interested in receiving the information specified in paragraph 5 of Section 2;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1543 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">to the extent applicable, confirming whether it will send the information specified in paragraphs 3 and 4 of Section 2 to Competent Authorities with respect to which this Agreement is in effect:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1544 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">i.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">that have the necessary laws in place to implement the Model Rules; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1545 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">ii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">that have expressed an interest in receiving such information.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1494 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">to the extent applicable, confirming whether the Jurisdiction will send the information specified in paragraph 5 of Section 2 to Competent Authorities with respect to which this Agreement is in effect:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1546 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">i.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">that have the necessary laws in place to implement the Model Rules and the Extended Scope;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1547 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">ii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">that have the necessary laws in place to implement the Model Rules; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1548 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">iii.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">that have expressed an interest in receiving such information.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1521 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">if applicable, specifying that it will send, but not receive information under Section 2 of this Agreement;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1549 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft255">if applicable, specifying the details of Government Verification Services accepted by its Jurisdiction;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1550 ft144"><SPAN class="ft246">g)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">if applicable, specifying safeguards for the protection of personal data;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1521 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">h)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft204">demonstrating that it has in place adequate measures to ensure the required confidentiality and data safeguards standards are met;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1521 ft144"><SPAN class="ft246">i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft257">specifying the Jurisdictions of the Competent Authorities with respect to which it intends to have this Agreement in effect, following national legislative procedures (if any); and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1551 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">j)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft260">confirming whether the Jurisdiction wishes to receive Financial Account Identifiers for taxpayer matching purposes.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1409 ft162">Competent Authorities must notify the <NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat, promptly, of any subsequent change to be made to the <NOBR>above-mentioned</NOBR> notifications.</P>
<P class="p1320 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">This Agreement will come into effect between two Competent Authorities on the later of the following dates: (i) the date on which the second of the two Competent Authorities has provided notification to the </SPAN><NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat under subparagraphs 1(a),(c) and (h) through (j), including listing the other Competent Authority’s Jurisdiction pursuant to subparagraph 1(i), and, if applicable, (ii) the date on which the Convention has entered into force and is in effect for both Jurisdictions.</P>
<P class="p1267 ft162"><SPAN class="ft144">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft184">The </SPAN><NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat will maintain a list that will be published on the OECD website of the Competent Authorities that have signed the Agreement and between which Competent Authorities this is an Agreement in effect.</P>
<P class="p1362 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">The </SPAN><NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat will publish on the OECD website the information provided by Competent Authorities pursuant to subparagraphs 1(a) through (f). The information provided pursuant to subparagraphs 1(g) through (j) will be made available to other signatories by the <NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat.</P>
<P class="p1265 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">A Competent Authority may suspend the exchange of information under this Agreement by giving notice in writing to another Competent Authority that it has determined that there is or has been significant </SPAN><NOBR>non-compliance</NOBR> by the <NOBR>second-mentioned</NOBR> Competent Authority with this Agreement. Such temporary suspension will have immediate effect. For the purposes of this paragraph, significant <NOBR>non-compliance</NOBR> includes, but is not limited to, <NOBR>non-compliance</NOBR> with the confidentiality and data safeguard provisions of this Agreement and the Convention or a failure by the Competent Authority to provide timely or adequate information as required under this Agreement or a failure to put in place measures that ensure that the</P>
<P class="p1552 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">379</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_380">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1252 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1253 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1466 ft54">| <SPAN class="ft152">13</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1477 ft162">Model Rules are effectively implemented and are complied with by Reporting Platform Operators, in a manner that frustrates the purposes of the Model Rules.</P>
<P class="p1488 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft167">A Competent Authority may terminate its participation in this Agreement, or with respect to a particular Competent Authority, by giving notice of termination in writing to the </SPAN><NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat. Such termination will become effective on the first day of the month following the expiration of a period of 12 months after the date of the notice of termination. In the event of termination, all information previously received under this Agreement will remain confidential and subject to the terms of the Convention.</P>
<P class="p1553 ft250">SECTION 8</P>
<P class="p1554 ft181"><NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat</P>
<P class="p1555 ft161">Unless otherwise provided for in the Agreement, the <NOBR>Co-ordinating</NOBR> Body Secretariat will notify all Competent Authorities of any notifications that it has received under this Agreement and will provide a notice to all signatories of the Agreement when a new Competent Authority signs the Agreement.</P>
<P class="p1479 ft144">Done in English and French, both texts being equally authentic.</P>
<P class="p1556 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">380</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_381">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1248 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1249 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1458 ft54"><SPAN class="ft152">14</SPAN><SPAN class="ft153">|</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1557 ft165">Declaration</P>
<P class="p1558 ft161">I, [NAME and TITLE], on behalf of the Competent Authority of [JURISDICTION] declare that it hereby agrees to comply with the provisions of the</P>
<P class="p1559 ft186">Multilateral Competent Authority Agreement on</P>
<P class="p1560 ft186">Automatic Exchange of Information on Income Derived through Digital Platforms</P>
<P class="p1561 ft144">hereafter referred to as the “Agreement” and attached to this Declaration.</P>
<P class="p1562 ft144">By means of the present Declaration, the Competent Authority of [JURISDICTION] is to be considered a signatory of the Agreement as from [DATE]. The Agreement will come into effect in respect of the Competent Authority of [JURISDICTION] in accordance with paragraph 2 of Section 7 thereof.</P>
<P class="p1563 ft144">Signed in [PLACE] on [DATE]</P>
<P class="p1564 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">381</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_382">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1252 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1253 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1466 ft54">| <SPAN class="ft152">15</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1565 ft249">Part II - Optional module to extend the scope of the Model Rules to</P>
<P class="p1566 ft225">the sale of goods and the rental of means of transportation</P>
<P class="p1567 ft261">Changes to the Model Rules</P>
<P class="p1568 ft162">In order to extend the scope of the Model Rules to cover the sale of goods and the rental of means of transportation, the following amendments and additions shall be made:</P>
<P class="p1569 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft183">Section I(A)(1) of the Model Rules shall be amended as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1570 ft186">A <SPAN class="ft261">“Platform” </SPAN>means any software, including a website or a part thereof and applications, including mobile applications, accessible by users and allowing Sellers to be connected to other users for the provision of Relevant Services or the sale of Goods , directly or indirectly, to such users. The operations of the Platform may also include the collection and payment of Consideration in respect of Relevant Activities. The term Platform does not include software exclusively allowing the:</P>
<P class="p1571 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft262">processing of payments in relation to Relevant Activities;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1572 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft262">listing or advertising in relation to Relevant Activities; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1571 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">redirecting or transferring of users to a Platform</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1571 ft186">without any further intervention in the provision of Relevant Services or the sale of Goods.</P>
<P class="p1573 ft266"><SPAN class="ft144">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft264">Section I(A)(3) of the Model Rules shall be amended as follows: </SPAN><SPAN class="ft265">[Optional provision –</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1574 ft186">An <SPAN class="ft261">“Excluded Platform Operator” </SPAN>is a Platform Operator that</P>
<P class="p1575 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">facilitates the provision of Relevant Services or the sale of Goods for which the aggregate Consideration at the level of the Platform over the previous calendar year is less than EUR 1 million and that notifies the tax administration of [jurisdiction] that it elects to be treated as such;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1576 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">demonstrates to the satisfaction of the tax administration of [jurisdiction] that the Platform’s entire business model is such that it does not allow Sellers to derive a profit from the Consideration; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1577 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">demonstrates to the satisfaction of the tax administration of [jurisdiction] that the Platform’s entire business model is such that it does not have Reportable Sellers.]</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1578 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">382</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_383">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1248 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1249 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1458 ft54"><SPAN class="ft152">16</SPAN><SPAN class="ft153">|</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1579 ft270"><SPAN class="ft144">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft267">Section I(A)(3) of the Model Rules shall be amended as follows: </SPAN><SPAN class="ft268">A “</SPAN><SPAN class="ft269">Relevant Service</SPAN><SPAN class="ft268">” is:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1580 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">the rental of immovable property;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1324 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">a Personal Service; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1381 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft271">the rental of a means of transport</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1324 ft186">for Consideration.</P>
<P class="p1581 ft144">4. Section I(A)(6) shall be amended as follows:</P>
<P class="p1582 ft186">“<SPAN class="ft261">Consideration</SPAN>” is compensation in any form that is paid or credited to a Seller in connection with Relevant Activities, the amount of which is known or reasonably knowable by the Platform Operator.</P>
<P class="p1583 ft275"><SPAN class="ft144">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft272">A new Section I(A)(8) is added to the Model Rules: </SPAN><SPAN class="ft273">A “</SPAN><SPAN class="ft274">Relevant Activity</SPAN><SPAN class="ft273">” is:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1383 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">a Relevant Service; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1324 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">the sale of Goods</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1381 ft186">for Consideration.</P>
<P class="p1581 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft183">Section I(B)(1) shall be amended as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1584 ft186">A <SPAN class="ft261">“Seller” </SPAN>is a Platform user that is registered at any moment during the Reportable Period on the Platform for the provision of Relevant Services or the sale of Goods.</P>
<P class="p1581 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">7.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft183">Section I(B)(2) shall be amended as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1585 ft186">An “<SPAN class="ft261">Active Seller” </SPAN>is any Seller that either provides Relevant Services or sells Goods during the Reportable Period or is paid or credited Consideration in connection with Relevant Activities during the Reportable Period.</P>
<P class="p1586 ft270"><SPAN class="ft144">8.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft267">Section I(B)(4) of the Model Rules shall be amended as follows: </SPAN><SPAN class="ft268">An “</SPAN><SPAN class="ft269">Excluded Seller</SPAN><SPAN class="ft268">” is any Seller:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1386 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">that is an Entity for which the Platform Operator facilitated more than 2,000 Relevant Services for the rental of immovable property in respect of a Property Listing during the Reportable Period;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1324 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">that is a governmental entity;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1587 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft271">that is an Entity the stock of which is regularly traded on an established securities market or a related Entity of an Entity the stock of which is regularly traded on an established securities market; or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1588 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft263">for which the Platform Operator solely facilitated less than 30 Relevant Activities for the sale of Goods and for which the total amount of Consideration paid or credited did not exceed 2,000 EUR during the Reportable Period.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1589 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">383</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_384">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1252 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1253 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1466 ft54">| <SPAN class="ft152">17</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1590 ft266"><SPAN class="ft144">9.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft264">A new Section I(C)(10) is added to the Model Rules: </SPAN><SPAN class="ft265">“</SPAN><SPAN class="ft276">Goods</SPAN><SPAN class="ft265">” means any tangible property.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1591 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">10.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft277">Section II(A)(1) shall be amended as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1592 ft186">For the purpose of determining whether a Seller is an Excluded Seller described in subparagraph B(4)(a) or (d) of Section I, a Reporting Platform Operator may rely on its available records.</P>
<P class="p1578 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">11.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft277">Section II(B)(1) shall be amended as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1593 ft186">The Reporting Platform Operator must collect the following information for each individual Seller that is not an Excluded Seller:</P>
<P class="p1578 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">12.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft277">Section III(B)(2) shall be amended as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1592 ft186">with respect to each Reportable Seller that provided Personal Services, rented out of a means of transportation or sold Goods: […]</P>
<P class="p1594 ft186"><SPAN class="ft186">f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft278">the total Consideration paid or credited during each quarter of the Reportable Period and the number of such Relevant Activities in respect of which it was paid or credited; and […].</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1578 ft144"><SPAN class="ft144">13.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft277">Section IV(1) shall be amended as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1595 ft186">It is expected that jurisdictions have measures in place that require Reporting Platform Operators to enforce the collection and verification requirements of Section II of the Model Rules in relation to their Sellers. This could, for instance, include a requirement that Reporting Platform Operators cannot allow Sellers to be connected to other users for the provision of Relevant Services or the sale of Goods, or that the <NOBR>pay-out</NOBR> of Consideration is withheld by the Reporting Platform Operator, in case the Seller does not provide the information required under Section II. This is to ensure that the information that is used for the due diligence processes and for reporting the Seller is accurate and complete at the end of each Reportable Period in view of reporting such information.</P>
<P class="p1596 ft261">Interpretative guidance</P>
<P class="p1572 ft186">Applying subparagraph A(1) of Section II regarding the due diligence procedures</P>
<P class="p1597 ft161">Subparagraph A(1) of Section II provides that for the purpose of determining whether a Seller is an Excluded Seller described in subparagraph B(4)(a) or (d) of Section I, a Reporting Platform Operator may rely on its available records. As these exclusions are dependent on the Relevant Activities carried out by the Seller during the Reportable Period, it is uncertain at the moment of the registration of the Seller whether it will be an Excluded Seller. In light of this, the Model Rules provide flexibility to Reporting Platform Operators to either apply the collection requirements under Paragraph B of Section</P>
<P class="p1598 ft161"><SPAN class="ft144">II</SPAN><SPAN class="ft279">to Sellers upon their registration on the Platform, or alternatively, to collect such information at a later point in time (e.g. when, based on the Relevant Activities facilitated for the Seller, the Reporting Platform Operator determines that such Seller is less likely to be an Excluded Seller described in subparagraph B(4)(a) or (d) of Section I for the relevant Reporting Period). In any event, a Reporting Platform Operator must complete the due diligence procedures set out in Paragraphs A through E of</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1599 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">384</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_385">


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1248 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p1249 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1458 ft54"><SPAN class="ft152">18</SPAN><SPAN class="ft153">|</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1600 ft162">Section II by 31 December of the Reportable Period and ensure that information is only reported about Reportable Sellers that are not Excluded Sellers.</P>
<P class="p1601 ft186">Reporting Platform Operator acting as counterparty and the Platform definition</P>
<P class="p1602 ft162">Pursuant to subparagraph B(1) of Section I, Sellers that have registered on the Platform for the purpose of selling Goods are in scope of the Model Rules.</P>
<P class="p1603 ft161">In this respect, the term “Platform” is defined in subparagraph A(1) of Section I to mean any software, including a website or a part thereof and applications, including mobile applications, accessible by users and allowing Sellers to be connected to other users for […] the sale of Goods, directly or indirectly, to such users. As such, an integral part of the Platform definition is that registered, third party Sellers need to be connected to users via the Platform to complete the sale of Goods transaction.</P>
<P class="p1604 ft161">Therefore, a website of a business that exclusively facilitates the online sales by such business of its own Goods is not a Platform for the purpose of subparagraph A(1) of Section I.</P>
<P class="p1602 ft162">Where a Reporting Platform Operator (also) sells Goods in its own name directly via its Platform, such Reporting Platform Operator is not a Seller for the purposes of subparagraph B(1) of Section I as it did not register on the Platform for the purpose of being connected to Platform users for the sale of Goods.</P>
<P class="p1605 ft161">Similarly, where the Reporting Platform Operator purchases Goods from a wholesaler through the traditional channels, such wholesaler is not a Seller for the purposes of subparagraph B(1) of Section I with respect to such sales as it did not register on the Platform for the purpose of being connected to Platform users for the sale of Goods.</P>
<TABLE cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 class="t88">
<TR>
	<TD class="tr28 td290"><P class="p15 ft144">*</P></TD>
	<TD class="tr28 td202"><P class="p15 ft144">*</P></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P class="p1606 ft144">*</P>
<P class="p1607 ft246">MODEL REPORTING RULES FOR DIGITAL PLATFORMS © OECD 2021</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">385</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_386">
<DIV id="p386dimg1">
<IMG src="http://data.riksdagen.se/fil/HA036/HA036386x1.jpg" style="width:517px;height:731px"  id="p386img1">
</DIV>


<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p27 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6</P>
<P class="p576 ft3">Bilaga 4</P>
<P class="p1608 ft280">Model Reporting Rules for</P>
<P class="p1609 ft280">Digital Platforms</P>
<P class="p1610 ft281">International Exchange Framework and</P>
<P class="p1611 ft281">Optional Module for Sale of Goods</P>
<P class="p1612 ft282">The Model Rules for Reporting by Digital Platforms were developed in light of the rapid growth of the digital economy and in response to calls for a global reporting framework in respect of activities being facilitated by such platforms, in particular in the sharing and gig economy.</P>
<P class="p1613 ft151">Reflecting the interest of a number of jurisdictions to permit the extension of the scope of the Model Rules to the sale of goods and the rental of means of transportation, the OECD has developed an optional module allowing such jurisdictions to implement the Model Rules with an extended scope.</P>
<P class="p1612 ft282">Exchanges of information under the Model Rules are operationalised by an international legal framework in the form of the Multilateral Competent Authority Agreement.</P>
<P class="p1614 ft282">For more information:</P>
<P class="p1615 ft282">ctp.contact@oecd.org</P>
<P class="p1616 ft282">www.oecd.org/tax</P>
<P class="p1617 ft282">@OECDtax</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">386</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_387">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p27 ft1">Promemorians sammanfattning</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6 Bilaga 5</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p1618 ft3">I promemorian lämnas i huvudsak de förslag som behövs för att genomföra rådets direktiv (EU) 2021/514 av den 22 mars 2021 om ändring av direktiv 2011/16/EU om administrativt samarbete i fråga om beskattning.</P>
<P class="p200 ft3">Förslaget innebär att svenska plattformsoperatörer ska lämna uppgifter om vad de personer tjänar som använder plattformarna för att sälja varor eller tjänster. Uppgifterna ska rapporteras till skattemyndigheten i det land där plattformsoperatören har hemvist. Uppgifterna ska lämnas avseende både säljare som har hemvist i den medlemsstat där uppgifterna ska rapporteras och säljare som har hemvist i andra medlemsstater. Om en operatör i ett land utanför EU bedriver verksamhet med viss anknytning till EU måste den registrera sig i en medlemsstat (t.ex. Sverige) i EU och lämna uppgifter till den behöriga myndigheten i det landet. Utöver direktivet genomförs även OECD:s motsvarande modellregler som ska tillämpas vid informationsutbyte mellan Sverige och tredjeländer avseende samma typ av uppgifter enligt ett gällande avtal mellan behöriga myndigheter om automatiskt utbyte av upplysningar om inkomster som erhållits genom digitala plattformar. I Sverige ska plattformsoperatörerna lämna uppgifter om alla rapporteringspliktiga säljare, dvs. sådana som har hemvist i Sverige, en annan medlemsstat i EU eller ett tredjeland. Uppgifterna ska sedan överföras av Skatteverket till andra medlemsstater och tredjeländer med vilka det finns ett gällande avtal om sådant utbyte.</P>
<P class="p538 ft3">I direktivet finns vidare bestämmelser som syftar till att ytterligare förbättra det redan väl fungerande administrativa samarbetet på direktskatteområdet mellan medlemsstater. Exempelvis införs en ny form av revision som kan utföras gemensamt mellan myndigheter i olika medlemsstater, s.k. gemensamma revisioner. Det redan befintliga automatiska informationsutbytet utvidgas också till att även, om uppgifter finns, omfatta royaltyer. Det sätts också en miniminivå för vilka kategorier av inkomster och kapital som det måste finnas tillgång till för att utbyte med andra medlemsstater ska ske. Även kvaliteten på uppgifterna och möjligheten att identifiera vem uppgifterna avser ska förbättras genom direktivet, t.ex. genom att det uttryckligen anges att medlemsstaterna ska sträva efter att lämna uppgift om skatteregistreringsnummer för den person som uppgifterna avser. Ytterligare ett exempel på ändringar är att det kommer att bli möjligt att stoppa utflödet av data till medlemsstater eller andra länder som inte kan upprätthålla sekretessen eller informations- säkerheten för de uppgifter som tas emot.</P>
<P class="p1619 ft3">Bestämmelserna föreslås i huvudsak träda i kraft den 1 januari 2023. Bestämmelserna om gemensamma revisioner föreslås dock träda i kraft först den 1 januari 2024.</P>
<P class="p1620 ft3">387</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_388">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1189 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6 Bilaga 6</P>
<P class="p1190 ft3">388</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft1">Promemorians lagförslag</P>
<P class="p65 ft3">I promemorian lämnas följande förslag till lagtext.</P>
<P class="p1621 ft20">Förslag till lag om plattformsoperatörers inhämtande av vissa uppgifter på skatteområdet</P>
<P class="p67 ft3">Härigenom föreskrivs<SPAN class="ft21">1 </SPAN>följande.</P>
<P class="p68 ft22">1 kap. Lagens tillämpningsområde och innehåll</P>
<P class="p69 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">1 § </SPAN>I denna lag finns bestämmelser om vilka åtgärder rapporterings- skyldiga plattformsoperatörer ska vidta för att inhämta uppgifter om säljare på plattformarna. I lagen finns också bestämmelser om vissa andra skyldigheter för plattformsoperatörer. Bestämmelser om rapporterings- skyldiga plattformsoperatörers uppgiftsskyldighet avseende rapport- eringspliktiga säljare finns i 22 c kap. skatteförfarandelagen (2011:1244).</P>
<P class="p668 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">2 § </SPAN>I lagen finns</P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">–</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">definitioner och förklaringar (2 kap.),</SPAN></P>
<P class="p72 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">–</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">bestämmelser om anmälningsskyldighet för rapporteringsskyldiga plattformsoperatörer som har anknytning till Sverige (3 kap.),</SPAN></P>
<P class="p73 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">–</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">bestämmelser om registreringsskyldighet för vissa plattformsopera- törer som har hemvist utanför Europeiska unionen (4 kap.),</SPAN></P>
<P class="p74 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">–</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">bestämmelser om anmälan om undantag från rapporteringsskyldighet (5 kap.), och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p75 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">–</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">bestämmelser om åtgärder för kundkännedom avseende rapporterings- pliktiga säljare (6 kap.).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p68 ft22">2 kap. Definitioner och förklaringar</P>
<P class="p76 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">1 § </SPAN>I detta kapitel finns definitioner av vissa begrepp samt förklaringar till hur vissa termer och uttryck används i lagen.</P>
<P class="p77 ft23">Grundläggande begrepp för plattformsoperatör</P>
<P class="p78 ft4">Rapporteringsskyldig plattformsoperatör</P>
<P class="p79 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">2 § </SPAN>Med rapporteringsskyldig plattformsoperatör avses en plattforms- operatör som inte är en undantagen plattformsoperatör och som</P>
<P class="p80 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">har skatterättslig hemvist i Sverige,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1622 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">inte har skatterättslig hemvist i någon stat eller jurisdiktion men som a) har sin plats för företagsledning eller faktiska företagsledning i</SPAN></P>
<P class="p99 ft3">Sverige, eller</P>
<P class="p75 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">har ett fast driftställe i Sverige och inte är en kvalificerad plattforms- operatör utanför Europeiska unionen.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p82 ft27"><SPAN class="ft25">1</SPAN><SPAN class="ft26">Jfr rådets direktiv 2011/16/EU av den 15 februari 2011 om administrativt samarbete i fråga om beskattning, i lydelsen enligt rådets direktiv (EU) 2021/514.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_389">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p303 ft3">En plattformsoperatör som uppfyller kraven som avses i första stycket i både Sverige och en annan medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen är en rapporteringsskyldig plattformsoperatör enligt denna lag om den väljer att fullgöra rapporteringskraven för rapporteringsskyldiga plattforms- operatörer enligt rådets direktiv 2011/16/EU om administrativt samarbete i fråga om beskattning, i lydelsen enligt rådets direktiv (EU) 2021/514, i Sverige i stället för i en annan medlemsstat.</P>
<P class="p1623 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">3 § </SPAN>Med rapporteringsskyldig plattformsoperatör avses även en plattformsoperatör som inte är en undantagen plattformsoperatör och som förmedlar berörd verksamhet där en eller flera rapporteringspliktiga säljare har hemvist i en medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen eller förmedlar en berörd verksamhet som innefattar uthyrning av fast egendom som är belägen i en medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen, under förutsättning att plattformsoperatören inte</P>
<P class="p672 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">har skatterättslig hemvist i en medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">är inregistrerad i en medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p102 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">har sin plats för företagsledning eller faktiska företagsledning i en medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">har ett fast driftställe i en medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p404 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">är en kvalificerad plattformsoperatör utanför Europeiska unionen. En plattformsoperatör är inte rapporteringsskyldig enligt första stycket</SPAN></P>
<P class="p340 ft3">om den registrerar sig och lämnar uppgifter i någon annan medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen.</P>
<P class="p96 ft4">Plattform</P>
<P class="p101 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">4 § </SPAN>Med plattform avses all programvara, däribland en webbplats, del av en webbplats eller applikationer, inklusive mobila applikationer, som gör det möjligt för säljare att vara anslutna till andra användare för att bedriva berörd verksamhet, direkt eller indirekt, i förhållande till andra användare. Detta omfattar även arrangemang för inkassering och betalning av ersättning med avseende på berörd verksamhet.</P>
<P class="p341 ft3">Med plattform avses inte programvara som utan några ytterligare åtgärder inom ramen för en berörd verksamhet endast möjliggör</P>
<P class="p80 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">hantering av betalningar i samband med berörd verksamhet,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">användares listning av, eller reklam för, en berörd verksamhet, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p80 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">omdirigering eller överföring av användare till en plattform.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p91 ft4">Plattformsoperatör</P>
<P class="p101 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">5 § </SPAN>Med plattformsoperatör avses en enhet som ingår avtal med säljare i syfte att göra hela eller delar av plattformen tillgänglig för dessa säljare.</P>
<P class="p96 ft4">Undantagen plattformsoperatör</P>
<P class="p101 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">6 § </SPAN>Med undantagen plattformsoperatör avses en plattformsoperatör som på förhand och årligen på ett tillfredsställande sätt visar att plattformens hela företagsmodell är sådan att den inte har rapporteringspliktiga säljare.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p298 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6 Bilaga 6</P>
<P class="p1240 ft3">389</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_390">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1189 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6 Bilaga 6</P>
<P class="p1190 ft3">390</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft4">Kvalificerad plattformsoperatör utanför Europeiska unionen</P>
<P class="p94 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">7 § </SPAN>Med kvalificerad plattformsoperatör utanför Europeiska unionen avses en plattformsoperatör som endast förmedlar kvalificerad berörd verksamhet och</P>
<P class="p73 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">har skatterättslig hemvist i en kvalificerad jurisdiktion utanför Europeiska unionen, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p80 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">antingen</SPAN></P>
<P class="p75 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">är registrerad i enlighet med lagstiftningen i en kvalificerad juris- diktion utanför Europeiska unionen, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p73 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">har sin plats för företagsledning eller faktiska företagsledning i en kvalificerad jurisdiktion utanför Europeiska unionen.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p91 ft4">Kvalificerad jurisdiktion utanför Europeiska unionen</P>
<P class="p635 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">8 § </SPAN>Med kvalificerad jurisdiktion utanför Europeiska unionen avses en stat eller jurisdiktion utanför Europeiska unionen som har ett gällande kvalificerande avtal mellan behöriga myndigheter med de behöriga myndigheterna i samtliga medlemsstater som identifieras som rapporteringspliktiga jurisdiktioner enligt en förteckning som offentlig- görs av den staten eller jurisdiktionen utanför Europeiska unionen.</P>
<P class="p65 ft4">Gällande kvalificerande avtal mellan behöriga myndigheter</P>
<P class="p698 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">9 § </SPAN>Med gällande kvalificerande avtal mellan behöriga myndigheter avses ett avtal mellan behöriga myndigheter i en medlemsstat och en jurisdiktion utanför unionen</P>
<P class="p98 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">som kräver automatiskt utbyte av upplysningar som är likvärdiga, i den mening som avses i avsnitt I.A.7 i bilaga V till rådets direktiv 2011/16/EU om administrativt samarbete i fråga om beskattning, i lydelsen enligt rådets direktiv (EU) 2021/514, och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p202 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">vars likvärdighet med rådets direktiv (EU) 2021/514 bekräftats i en genomförandeakt i enlighet med artikel 8ac.7 i rådets direktiv 2011/16/EU</SPAN></P>
<P class="p27 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">i</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">lydelsen enligt rådets direktiv (EU) 2021/514.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p96 ft4">Berörd verksamhet</P>
<P class="p1624 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">10 § </SPAN>Med berörd verksamhet avses verksamhet som utförs mot ersättning och utgörs av</P>
<P class="p74 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">direkt eller indirekt uthyrning av fast egendom eller lös egendom som medför rätt att förfoga över fast egendom eller del av fast egendom,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">en personlig tjänst,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p80 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">försäljning av varor, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">uthyrning av transportmedel.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p133 ft3">Med berörd verksamhet avses dock inte verksamheter som utförs av en säljare i rollen som anställd hos plattformsoperatören eller hos en enhet som är en närstående enhet till den.</P>
<P class="p96 ft4">Kvalificerad berörd verksamhet</P>
<P class="p635 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">11 § </SPAN>Med kvalificerad berörd verksamhet avses en berörd verksamhet som omfattas av automatiskt utbyte av upplysningar enligt ett gällande kvalificerande avtal mellan behöriga myndigheter.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_391">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p27 ft4">Ersättning</P>
<P class="p101 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">12 § </SPAN>Med ersättning avses ersättning i någon form som tillgodoräknas eller betalats ut till en säljare avseende den berörda verksamheten och som plattformsoperatören har kännedom om eller rimligen kan antas ha kännedom om. Ersättningen innefattar inte eventuella avgifter, provisioner eller skatter som den rapporteringsskyldiga plattformsoperatören har hållit inne eller tagit ut.</P>
<P class="p65 ft4">Personlig tjänst</P>
<P class="p101 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">13 § </SPAN>Med personlig tjänst avses en tjänst som innefattar tids- eller uppgiftsbaserat arbete som</P>
<P class="p102 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">utförs av en eller flera fysiska personer som agerar oberoende eller på en enhets vägnar, och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p102 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">utförs på en användares begäran efter att ha förmedlats via en plattform.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p77 ft23">Grundläggande begrepp för säljare</P>
<P class="p103 ft4">Rapporteringspliktig säljare</P>
<P class="p104 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">14 § </SPAN>Med rapporteringspliktig säljare avses en aktiv säljare som inte är en undantagen säljare.</P>
<P class="p91 ft4">Säljare</P>
<P class="p104 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">15 § </SPAN>Med säljare avses en användare av en plattform som vid något tillfälle under den rapporteringspliktiga perioden är registrerad på plattformen och utför en berörd verksamhet.</P>
<P class="p91 ft4">Aktiv säljare</P>
<P class="p104 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">16 § </SPAN>Med aktiv säljare avses en säljare som under den rapporterings- pliktiga perioden</P>
<P class="p80 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">tillhandahåller en berörd verksamhet, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p105 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">tillgodoräknas eller får ersättning utbetald med anledning av en berörd verksamhet.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p91 ft4">Undantagen säljare</P>
<P class="p106 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">17 § </SPAN>Med undantagen säljare avses en säljare</P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">som är en myndighetsenhet,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">som är en enhet vars andelar är föremål för regelmässig handel på en etablerad värdepappersmarknad eller en närstående enhet till en sådan enhet,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">som är en enhet för vilken plattformsoperatören har förmedlat uthyrningar av fast egendom avseende samma förtecknade egendom under den rapporteringspliktiga perioden och antalet uthyrningar uppgår till fler än 2 000, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">för vilken plattformsoperatören har förmedlat försäljning av varor vid färre än 30 tillfällen och för vilken den totala ersättning som betalats ut eller tillgodoräknats inte överstigit 2 000 euro, under den rapporterings- pliktiga perioden.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p298 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6 Bilaga 6</P>
<P class="p1240 ft3">391</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_392">


<DIV>
<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p1189 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6 Bilaga 6</P>
<P class="p1190 ft3">392</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p27 ft23">Övriga definitioner och förklaringar</P>
<P class="p103 ft4">Enhet</P>
<P class="p94 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">18 § </SPAN>Med enhet avses en juridisk person eller en annan juridisk konstruktion, såsom ett bolag, en delägarbeskattad juridisk person, en trust eller en stiftelse.</P>
<P class="p96 ft4">Förtecknad egendom</P>
<P class="p106 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">19 § </SPAN>Med förtecknad egendom avses alla fasta egendomsenheter som</P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">är belägna på samma adress,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">innehas av en och samma ägare, och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p80 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">bjuds ut till uthyrning på en plattform av samma säljare.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p91 ft4">Hemvist</P>
<P class="p97 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">20 § </SPAN>Med hemvist i en stat eller jurisdiktion avses att en person har skatterättslig hemvist i den staten eller jurisdiktionen i enlighet med den statens eller jurisdiktionens lagstiftning.</P>
<P class="p98 ft3">En rapporteringsskyldig plattformsoperatör ska dock anse att en säljare har hemvist i den stat eller jurisdiktion där denne har sin primära adress. Om säljarens skatteregistreringsnummer har utfärdats i en annan stat eller jurisdiktion än den där säljaren har sin primära adress, ska den rapporteringsskyldiga plattformsoperatören anse att säljaren har hemvist även i den stat eller jurisdiktion där skatteregistreringsnumret har utfärdats om det är en medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen.</P>
<P class="p202 ft3">Om säljaren har lämnat upplysningar om förekomsten av ett fast driftställe enligt 6 kap. 4 § 6 ska den rapporteringsskyldiga plattforms- operatören anse att säljaren har hemvist även i respektive medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen som angetts av säljaren.</P>
<P class="p98 ft3">En rapporteringsskyldig plattformsoperatör ska därutöver anse att en säljare har hemvist i var och en av de stater och jurisdiktioner som bekräftats av en sådan elektronisk identifieringstjänst som avses i 6 kap. 5 § och som tillgängliggörs av en stat eller jurisdiktion eller av Europeiska unionen.</P>
<P class="p65 ft4">Identifikationskod för finansiellt konto</P>
<P class="p94 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">21 § </SPAN>Med identifikationskod för finansiellt konto avses ett unikt identifieringsnummer eller motsvarande som finns tillgängligt för plattformsoperatören och som gäller det bankkonto eller annat liknande konto för betalningstjänster till vilket ersättning betalats ut eller tillgodoräknats.</P>
<P class="p65 ft4">Myndighetsenhet</P>
<P class="p78 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">22 § </SPAN>Med myndighetsenhet avses</P>
<P class="p80 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">en medlemsstat eller annan stat eller jurisdiktion, eller dess regering,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p72 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">ett subnationellt politiskt förvaltningsområde i en medlemsstat eller i en annan stat eller jurisdiktion, och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p74 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">ett organ eller verk som helt ägs av en eller flera sådana enheter som avses i 1 och 2.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p72 ft3">Ett subnationellt politiskt förvaltningsområde som avses i första stycket 2 omfattar delstater, provinser, län, regioner och kommuner.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_393">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p27 ft4">Närstående enhet</P>
<P class="p78 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">23 § </SPAN>Med närstående enhet avses en enhet som</P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">kontrollerar den andra enheten,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p80 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">kontrolleras av den andra enheten, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1625 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft24">står under gemensam kontroll tillsammans med den andra enheten. Med kontroll avses i första stycket direkt eller indirekt innehav av mer</SPAN></P>
<P class="p99 ft3">än 50 procent av rösterna och värdet i en enhet.</P>
<P class="p303 ft3">Vid ett indirekt innehav ska bedömningen av om villkoren om kontroll i första och andra styckena är uppfyllda göras genom att andelarna på respektive nivå multipliceras med varandra. En person som innehar mer än 50 procent av rösterna på en nivå ska anses inneha 100 procent av rösterna på den nivån.</P>
<P class="p65 ft4">Primär adress</P>
<P class="p78 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">24 § </SPAN>Med primär adress avses</P>
<P class="p102 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">den adress där säljaren har sin primära bostad för en säljare som är en fysisk person, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p71 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">den adress där en säljare som är en enhet har sitt säte.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p91 ft4">Rapporteringspliktig period</P>
<P class="p104 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">25 § </SPAN>Med rapporteringspliktig period avses det kalenderår avseende vilket kontrolluppgift ska lämnas enligt 22 c kap. skatteförfarandelagen (2011:1244).</P>
<P class="p96 ft4">Registreringsnummer för mervärdesskatt</P>
<P class="p101 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">26 § </SPAN>Med registreringsnummer för mervärdesskatt avses ett unikt nummer som identifierar en beskattningsbar person eller en icke beskattningsbar juridisk person som är registrerad för mervärdesskatt.</P>
<P class="p96 ft4">Skatteregistreringsnummer</P>
<P class="p104 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">27 § </SPAN>Med skatteregistreringsnummer avses registreringsnummer för skattebetalare utfärdat av en stat eller jurisdiktion där säljaren har hemvist, eller funktionell motsvarighet om sådant nummer saknas.</P>
<P class="p96 ft4">Varor</P>
<P class="p78 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">28 § </SPAN>Med varor avses alla materiella tillgångar.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p27 ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6 Bilaga 6</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p125 ft4">Rapporteringspliktig jurisdiktion</P>
<P class="p542 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">29 § </SPAN>Med rapporteringspliktig jurisdiktion avses i denna lag en</P>
<P class="p111 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen, eller</SPAN></P>
<P class="p115 ft3"><SPAN class="ft3">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft28">en annan stat eller jurisdiktion med vilken Sverige har ett gällande avtal mellan behöriga myndigheter om automatiskt utbyte av upplysningar om inkomster som erhållits genom digitala plattformar och vilken har identifierats som en sådan i en lista som publicerats av det koordineringsorgan som avses i artikel 24.3 i bilaga 1 till lagen (1990:313) om Europaråds- och </SPAN><NOBR>OECD-konventionen</NOBR> om ömsesidig handräckning i skatteärenden.</P>
<P class="p796 ft3">393</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_394">


<P class="p498 ft4"><SPAN class="ft3">Prop. 2022/23:6 </SPAN>Betydelsen av vissa termer och uttryck</P>
<P class="p1626 ft3"><SPAN class="ft283">Bilaga 6</SPAN><SPAN style="padding-left:69px;"><SPAN class="ft23">30 § </SPAN>Termer och uttryck som används i denna lag har samma betydelse som i inkomstskattelagen (1999:1229), om inte något annat anges.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p1627 ft22">3 kap. Anmälningsskyldighet för rapporteringsskyldiga plattformsoperatörer som har anknytning till Sverige</P>
<P class="p1628 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">1 § </SPAN>Om en plattformsoperatör uppfyller kriterierna för att vara en rapporteringsskyldig plattformsoperatör enligt 2 kap. 2 § första stycket, ska plattformsoperatören snarast men senast inom två månader anmäla detta till Skatteverket.</P>
<P class="p622 ft3">En plattformsoperatör som uppfyller kriterierna enligt 2 kap. 2 § första stycket i både Sverige och en annan medlemsstat i Europeiska unionen ska snarast men senast inom två månader meddela Skatteverket om sitt val av medlemsstat att fullgöra rapporteringskraven i. Detta ska även meddelas till de behöriga myndigheterna i dessa medlemsstater. Om en sådan platt- formsoperatör inte har valt någon medlemsstat att fullgöra rapporterings- kraven i, ska den anses vara rapporteringsskyldig i Sverige.</P>
<P class="p1629 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">2 § </SPAN>En plattformsoperatör som inte längre uppfyller kriterierna för att vara en rapporteringsskyldig plattformsoperatör enligt 2 kap. 2 §, ska snarast men senast inom två månader anmäla detta till Skatteverket.</P>
<P class="p1630 ft3"><SPAN class="ft23">3 § </SPAN>Regeringen eller den myndighet som regeringen bestämmer får meddela föreskrifter om vilka uppgifter och vilken dokumentation en anmälan eller meddelande enligt 1 § eller en anmälan enligt 2 § ska innehålla.</P>
